content: repeat from * to end 70 single_crochet with no 1322 northern lights chain 2 half_double_crochet in round 8 each single_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch with no 1301 storm cloud chain 2 * 3 half_double_crochet in round 23 next 3 single_crochet hdc2tog in next 2 single_crochet repeat from * to end 56 with no 1303 highland fleece chain 3 double_crochet in round 9 half_double_crochet each half_double_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch with no 1314 deep velvet chain 3 * 2 double_crochet in with no 1323 ember glow chain 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet round 24 round 10 next 2 half_double_crochet decrease in next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end 42 to end of round join with slip_stitch double_crochet with no 1317 midnight sea chain 2 half_double_crochet in each round 11 with no 1318 thermal spring chain 1 * 1 single_crochet in single_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch round 25 next double_crochet decrease in next 2 double_crochet repeat from * to end 28 single_crochet with no 1310 cranberry compote chain 3 double_crochet in round 12 with no 1313 dark chocolate chain 2 * each half_double_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch round 26 hdc2tog in next 2 single_crochet repeat from * to end 14 half_double_crochet with no 1304 grey harbor chain 1 single_crochet in each round 13 with no 1302 drift wood chain 3 * decrease in double_crochet to end of round join with slip_stitch round 27 next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end 7 double_crochet with no 1316 spun gold chain 2 half_double_crochet in each single_crochet round 14 cut yarn leaving a 14 tail pull through last loop to fo to end of round join with slip_stitch p 03 blue sky fibers step no 2 finishing you will have small hole remaining at this point with a tapestry ndl and tail weave through top of 7 remaining stitches pull tight and weave in ends weave in all remaining ends block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel abbreviations chain chain *yarn over hook draw repeat repeat through loop on hook to form round s round s chain stitch repeat from * as rs right side many times as instructed single_crochet single_crochet insert hook in double_crochet double_crochet yarn over hook indicated stitch yarn over and insert hook in indicated stitch pull up a loop yarn over and draw yarn over and pull up a loop through 2 loops on hook *yarn over and draw through 2 slip_stitch slip_stitch loops on hook repeat from * one * repeat the directions between the more time asterisks as many times as fo fasten_off indicated half_double_crochet half_double_crochet yarn over hook insert hook in indicated stitch yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and draw through 3 loops on hook copyright ©2025 blue sky fibers blueskyfibers com this pattern is copyrighted material and
